title: DeepSeek-R1: Incentivizing Reasoning Capability in LLMs via RL
author: gradus_ad
aiHeadline: In a shocking turn of events, researchers have discovered a way to make Large Language Models (LLMs) actually think for themselves, kind of, with the introduction of DeepSeek-R1, a revolutionary new method that uses reinforcement learning to incentivize reasoning capability in LLMs, because who needs human intelligence when you can have robot intelligence, right?

title: Caltrain's electric fleet more efficient than expected
author: ssuds
aiHeadline: Caltrain's electric fleet is more efficient than expected, because who doesn't love a good underpromise and overdeliver, and now they can finally use the extra cash to invest in some decent coffee for their passengers, maybe even some comfortable seats, a guy can dream, right, and by the way, can we please get some electric fleets in more cities, pretty please with a non-polluting cherry on top?

title: Pixelfed Hit 500K Users
author: doener
aiHeadline: Pixelfed, the social media platform that's like Instagram but without the annoying ads and creepy data collection, has just hit a whopping 500K users, which is like, a whole lot of people who are tired of being treated like lab rats in a social media experiment, and are instead opting for a more chill, fediverse-based vibe, good for them, and good for Pixelfed, may they continue to thrive in this crazy online world

title: OpenRA â€“ Classic strategy games rebuilt for the modern era
author: tosh
aiHeadline: Get ready for a blast from the past, folks, as OpenRA brings back the classic strategy games of yore, rebuilt for the modern era, because who needs new and fancy games when you can just play the old ones with better graphics, and by 'better graphics', I mean 'not atrocious', and by 'not atrocious', I mean 'still kinda pixelated but in a charming way', anyway, go check it out and relive the good old days of gaming

title: CIA now favors lab leak theory to explain Covid's origins
author: doctaj
aiHeadline: In a shocking plot twist, the CIA has now come out in favor of the lab leak theory to explain the origins of Covid, because apparently, they've been watching too many conspiracy theory YouTube videos, and are now convinced that the real culprit behind the pandemic was not bats or snakes, but actually, a rogue scientist in a lab coat, muahahaha, just kidding, or are they, stay tuned for more updates on this developing story, and try not to get too caught up in the conspiracy theories, folks
